BARDOCK!

A "Good" Character

Bardock is a low-class Saiyan warrior, the husband of Gine, and the father of Raditz and Goku. Bardock's childhood until his early years in adulthood is unknown, but he is shown to lead his own squad into battle, and they are very successful in accomplishing their assignments. He is an adept fighter and a devoted Saiyan Army soldier under Frieza's Force until he realizes his tyrannical boss plans to annihilate the Saiyan race.

Bardock's transformations:
  • Oozaru
Bardock's signature moves:
  • Power Ball
  • Divination
  • Final Revenger
  • Full Power Energy Wave
  • Rebellion Spear
  • Final Spirit Cannon
More characteristics:
Alias Occupation Mentor
Masked Saiyan Squadron Commander None
Bardock's epic demise!
